```{r echo = FALSE}
load(system.file("data/mcmc_runs/FINAL/Model2.rda",
                  package = "senegalHIVmodel"))
load(system.file("data/mcmc_runs/FINAL/Model5.rda",
                  package = "senegalHIVmodel"))

#Model 2
m2 <- BayesianTools::MAP(m2.2, start = 2000)
m2.p <- as.numeric(format(round(m2$parametersMAP, 2), nsmall = 2))
m2.p[[16]] <- as.numeric(format(round(m2$valuesMAP[[1]], 2), nsmall = 2))
names(m2.p) <- (c("gpsp0", "gpsp1", "gpsp2", "gpsploc",
                  "msmsp0", "msmsp1", "msmsp2", "msmsploc",
                  "maleX", "import", "srcNe",
                  "pmsm2msm", "pgpf2gpm",
                  "initmsm", "initgp", "Lposterior"))

# Get ESS for each parameter
m2.s <- BayesianTools::getSample(m2.2, start = 2000, coda = TRUE)
m2.ESS <- as.numeric(format(round(coda::effectiveSize(m2.s), 0)))
names(m2.ESS) <- (c("gpsp0", "gpsp1", "gpsp2", "gpsploc",
                  "msmsp0", "msmsp1", "msmsp2", "msmsploc",
                  "maleX", "import", "srcNe",
                  "pmsm2msm", "pgpf2gpm",
                  "initmsm", "initgp"))

# Model 5
m5 <- BayesianTools::MAP(m5.1, start=4000)
m5.p <- as.numeric(format(round(m5$parametersMAP, 2), nsmall = 2))
m5.p[[16]] <- as.numeric(format(round(m5$valuesMAP[[1]], 2), nsmall = 2))
names(m5.p) <- (c("gpsp0", "gpsp1", "gpsp2", "gpsploc",
                  "msmsp0", "msmsp1", "msmsp2", "msmsploc",
                  "maleX", "import", "srcNe",
                  "pmsm2msm", "pgpf2gpm",
                         "initmsm", "initgp", "Lposterior"))

# Get ESS for each parameter
m5.s <- BayesianTools::getSample(m5.1, start = 4000, coda = TRUE)
m5.ESS <- as.numeric(format(round(coda::effectiveSize(m5.s), 0)))
names(m5.ESS) <- (c("gpsp0", "gpsp1", "gpsp2", "gpsploc",
                  "msmsp0", "msmsp1", "msmsp2", "msmsploc",
                  "maleX", "import", "srcNe",
                  "pmsm2msm", "pgpf2gpm",
                  "initmsm", "initgp"))

# Model 2 = Model 5 (prevalence)
m25 = data.frame(m2.p, m5.p) 
m25 <- as.matrix(m25)
colnames(m25)<-c("Model 2", "Model 5")

kable_table.m25 <- knitr::kable(m25, booktabs = TRUE, 
                               caption = "MAP for Models 2 and Model 5 (prevalence)")
kableExtra::kable_styling(kable_input = kable_table.m25,
                          latex_options = "striped",
                          full_width = FALSE, position = "center")
# ESS table
m25.ESS = data.frame(m2.ESS, m5.ESS) 
m25.ESS <- as.matrix(m25.ESS)
colnames(m25.ESS)<-c("Model 2", "Model 5")

kable_table.m25.ESS <- knitr::kable(m25.ESS, booktabs = TRUE, 
                                    caption = "Effective sample size (ESS) for Models 2 and Model 5 (prevalence)")
kableExtra::kable_styling(kable_input = kable_table.m25.ESS,
                          latex_options = "striped",
                          full_width = FALSE, position = "center")

```
